name: Infomation Extractor
short_description:
Information extraction (IE) is the task of automatically extracting structured information from structured  machine-readable documents.

The User enters  specific keyword based on which the software fetches information from the Word document.

Its fetches the Paragraph in which the Keyword occur.

The User can enter multiple Keywords.
The output will be a Document File consisting of all the information extracted from the Main Document.

The Document should be a 97-2003 Microsoft Word Document Only.
summary: To extract information from a Word Document on the basis of  Keyword.
